text: As if pumpkin spice lattes and pumpkin - scented candles weren ’ t enough, Catherine Zeta - Jones is giving us yet another reason to obsess over the seasonal vegetable this fall — and maybe even year - round. Speaking to W, Zeta - Jones called Rhonda Allison ’ s Pumpkin E Serum one of her “ makeup miracles. ” She also has the facts to back it up.
